summary.span: 定義您要群組查看各個層級的方式。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會顯示繫結至和程式碼後置內容包含邏輯，可加入和移除群組。The following examples show an that is bound to an and the code-behind content that contains the logic to add and remove grouping. 當核取方塊、 內容分組依據`Type`屬性。When the check box is checked, the content of the is grouped by the `Type` attribute. 每個群組是類型。Each group is of type . 指定，如此它會顯示為顯示每個群組。The is specified so that it appears as a that displays the of each the group. 在此情況下，是`Work`或`Home`。In this case, the is either `Work` or `Home`. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AlternationCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.AlternationCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定替代 物件的數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of alternating objects.
The number of alternating objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性和附加的屬性可讓您指定兩個或多個替代外觀物件。The property and the attached property enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating objects. 例如，您可以指定替代的背景色彩的每個第三個中。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third in an . 指派給每個中。The is assigned to each in the . 從 0 開始，直到遞增減 1 和 0 然後重新啟動。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果為 3，有七個中的物件下, 表列出每個項目。For example, if is 3 and there are seven objects in the , the following table lists the for each item. |位置中 Position of in the || |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 有數種方法可用來指定不同的外觀，替代物件。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating objects. 一種方法是將繫結中的屬性或的至。One method is to bind properties in the or of the to the . 然後您可以使用來指定應該套用哪一個值到具有特定值。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the that has a certain value. 您也可以使用觸發程序來變更屬性的值而定的值及其。You can also use triggers to change the value of a property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下列範例會建立繫結至的群組集合中的項目。The following example creates a that is bound to a that groups the items in the collection. 此範例會交替出現在每個標頭的背景之間兩個色彩來執行下列步驟：The example alternates the background for the header of each between two colors by doing the following: - 設定為 2。Sets to 2. - 建立傳回上的值，取決於。Creates an that returns a , depending on the value of . - 將繫結的中至屬性，並提供。Binds the of the in the to the property and provides the . 請注意，附加的屬性上設定，而繫結會使用來取得其值。Note that the attached property is set on the , and the binding uses to get its value. 此範例也替代項目中的項目背景藉由設定三種色彩之間上和繫結每個至。The example also alternates the background of the items in the between three colors by setting the on the and binding the of each to the . 在此情況下，背景交替使用三種色彩。In this case, the background alternates between three colors. ，群組項目不會顯示。The that groups the items is not shown. 如需如何群組項目資訊，請參閱[如何： 排序與群組資料使用 XAML 中的檢視](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md)。For information on how to group item, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md). [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

member this.HeaderStringFormat : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定複合字串，這個字串表示如何格式化顯示成字串的標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.

value.span: 複合字串，指定如何格式化顯示成字串的標頭。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是預先定義、 複合的或自訂字串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您設定或屬性、屬性會被忽略。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，分組價格範圍的項目集合。The following example creates a that groups a collection of items by price range. 轉換器`GroupByPrice`，傳回每個項目價格高於整數值。The converter, `GroupByPrice`, returns an integer value that is above each item's price. 例如，如果項目的價格是介於 0 到 100 之間，轉換器會傳回 100。For example, if an item's price is between 0 and 100, the converter returns 100. 此範例會使用建立字串，其中包含每個價格範圍的上限。The example uses the to create a string that includes the upper limit for each price range. 例如，在美國，100 元底下的項目分組，指出 「 下 $100 的項目 」 標題之下。For example, in the United States, items that are under 100 dollars are grouped under a heading that says "Items under $100". [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleHeaderStringFormat](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#groupstyleheaderstringformat)] 下列範例所示`GroupByPrice`類別`PurchaseItem`類別，而集合的繫結至。The following example shows the `GroupByPrice` class, the `PurchaseItem` class, and the collection that the is bound to. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#groupstyledata)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#GroupStyleData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#groupstyledata)]

[!code-xaml[GroupingSample#XAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml#xaml)] [!code-csharp[GroupingSample#Code](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#code)] [!code-vb[GroupingSample#Code](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GroupingSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#code)] 下列範例示範如何使用屬性：The following example shows how to use the property: [!code-xaml[DataBindingLab#GroupStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#groupstyle)] 下列是定義`groupingHeaderTemplate` :The following is the definition of the `groupingHeaderTemplate`: [!code-xaml[DataBindingLab#HeaderTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#headertemplate)] 如需完整範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete sample, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
